thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marais Grands Boulevards - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good experience
thread.title_full: Good experience - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Marais Grands Boulevards, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 47mohamadk
title: Good experience
text: Newly renovated beautiful and very comfortable rooms. Staff are very friendly. Internet connection was not that good. However, this did not affect my work as I had 4G service that I used. It was my first time to use this hotel. I am sure I will use it again during my future stays in Paris.
